sys_script.name: Set τομεας automatically

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_4b07759687df3c5005ec65750cbb3564
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_epats_qhs_qhs_policy</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_epats_qhs_qhs_policy">is_revise_program!=true^EQ<item endquery="false" field="is_revise_program" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="!=" or="false" value="true"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Set τομεας automatically</name><order>1</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	var groups = ['AFC','CA','CON','DEV','GMI','HR','ICT','INSEC','LEG','MB','PROC','QHS','STRAT-REG'];
	
	for (var i=0;i<groups.length;i++){
		if (gs.getUser().isMemberOf(groups[i])){
			current.u_owning_group_qhs = groups[i];
			current.owning_group = groups[i];
			current.opened_by = gs.getUser();
			current.u_owner_qhs = gs.getUser();
			break;
		}
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>alex</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-10-21 21:23:02</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>4b07759687df3c5005ec65750cbb3564</sys_id><sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set τομεας automatically</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="QHS" source="x_epats_qhs">7031c0461be6f050aa2b4371b24bcb49</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="QHS">7031c0461be6f050aa2b4371b24bcb49</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_4b07759687df3c5005ec65750cbb3564</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>alex</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-11-03 11:20:44</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=4b07759687df3c5005ec65750cbb3564"/></record_update>
